group_1.narration: Running to-and-fro collecting ingredients,@Tsuruno's group had finally arrived@at the Mizuna Ward store.

group_1.textLeft: We've been collecting non-stop!

group_1.textRight: B-but just as I thought,@there's so much to carry...it's heavy...
Quit the whinin'.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? That girl over there...@I wonder what happened.

group_1.textRight: Let's check it out.
What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Huu...kuu... So...hungry...@Where am I...?

group_1.textRight: She's runnin' empty 'n looks lost.
You sound like you've lost all hope!!
There's a CoCoIchi nearby, so we'll take you!!

group_1.textLeft: *Pant*...*Pant*... CoCo...Ichi...?
[chara:801200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
No!
No! No!@Nooo~~~!!

group_1.textRight: Eh?! Ah— wait!

group_1.textLeft: Oi, that way!

group_1.textRight: SANA! WATCH OUT!!@SHE'S GONNA SMACK INTO YOU!!

group_1.textLeft: You okay?!

group_1.textRight: Y-yes...that was close.
I-I'm glad that girl is okay too...

group_1.textLeft: That girl was pretty fast on her feet. If she crashed@into you that would've been a train wreck.

group_1.textRight: I was...lucky then...

group_1.textLeft: Hell, be more careful.

group_1.textRight: E-excuse me...

group_1.textLeft: No, not you, Sana. Meant her.

group_1.textRight: W-well, it would be difficult for her to avoid me@when we can't expect her to even see me...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, right, I'm bein' careless.

group_1.textRight: I-I also forget sometimes when I'm with everyone[chara:100401:lipSynch_0]...@[wait:1.5][chara:100401:lipSynch_1][chara:100401:motion_400][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]AHH!!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What's wrong?!

group_1.textRight: I-I've been so careless...!!
Why didn't I realize... I'm sorry...
T-though the truth is I've felt out of place@for a long time now.
But I never knew why that was, so I couldn't@tell anyone.

group_1.textLeft: W-wait.@What is this? Calm down.

group_1.textRight: ...That lady employee,
she said she would treat us to curry, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's exactly why we're workin' so hard!

group_1.textRight: But...I remember what she said back then...
That she would prepare enough for six people...

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong with that?
Me, Iroha, Ui, Yachiyo, Tsuruno and...Sana!@...That's six.

group_1.textRight: That's correct... That lady...
Can see me.

group_1.textLeft: Then that...means...

group_1.narration: Yachiyo continued her call with the lady.
She then found out that@both trucks were on the same road@just before going missing.
And that road is the longest route in Kamihama,@going all the way south through Shinsei Ward.

group_1.textLeft: It's pretty close to here.@Let's go, and be ready.

group_1.textRight: It's finally time...@By the way, Yachiyo...
This whole thing, do you think it was caused by@a Witch or a Magical Girl...?

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, I want to believe it's a Witch, but on the@other hand I'm more convinced it's a Magical Girl.
The magic I felt back at the new store belonged@to a Magical Girl...
But that's all I know.
I had no idea whose magic that belonged to.

group_1.textRight: That's true...

group_1.textLeft: I hate having doubts about people,@but I can't help it.
Besides, a Witch who only goes after CoCoIchi@just makes no sense.

group_1.textRight: R-right...

group_1.textLeft: Now for the regular Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today's guest is Natsuki Utsuho!

group_1.textRight: Thanks for having me!

group_1.textLeft: Now then, your favorite topping! Go ahead!

group_1.textRight: My recommended topping is roast katsu!

group_1.textLeft: The tried-and-true.
I wonder if it's the most popular katsu of them all.
Is there a reason for your choice? Well, at this point@you may not even need to explain...

group_1.textRight: Right! A long time ago there was a player on our@baseball team named Ross...
Ross the catcher! So I eat that a lot@since it sounds like him!!

group_1.textLeft: I was hoping you'd mention the appeal of the flavor.
Fortune time!@Having roast katsu today...
Might make you look at stars more sincerely@than usual!

group_1.textRight: If you're pretty sure you're not a cow...@Move on over to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
